Tutorials#ResourcePlanManagement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When a suggested person suits the position, you need to Accept the Resource. Otherwise, you should Reject it. While the person is under consideration (interviewing or etc) you can book him for 2 weeks. Booking of candidates is an act of reserving available candidates for an unstaffed position. After booking, an employee cannot be considered for new opportunities (for both PRR and Case). Thus booking of an employee excludes him from the internal resources market.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Booking+Workflow#BookingWorkflow-BookingofCandidatetopositioninPRR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Booking of Candidate to position in you accept the proposed resource, this action is automatically synced with the other applications (PMC, JIRA, CTC, etc).  The synchronization starts automatically in the following position\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A position with an employee already assigned is terminated/cancelled, and the employee has no other roles in the project\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A hold\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An resources on bench, please, contact Bench manager of corresponding discipline. For detailed instructions, please, follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Utilizing+employees+on+bench\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Utilizing employees on bench guide.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Together with that, you can use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFT Bench Managers \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"of your country.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If there is nobody appropriate available, we move to the looking for candidate from the market by creation of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMOCC/Working+with+Vacancy+Request+-+Hire+right!+-+ready+for+review\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vacancy Request\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon as an appropriate person is found and job offer is accepted, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/workload/html/help/WebHelp_long/Recruiting_new_people/Creating_a_new_employee_request.htm\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" New Employee Reques\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/workload/html/help/WebHelp_long/Recruiting_new_people/Creating_a_new_employee_request.htm\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"t\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – to be submitted. This request supposes accounts creation for all internal systems, working place arrangement, pass key creation and etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource plans:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" One of the main responsibilities of Account Managers in UPSA is to keep a resource plan (RP) of the project, they are assigned to, up-to-date. AM is the primary contact point with the customer who finds out about ramp-ups and ramp-downs on a project. RPs should be updated as soon as AMs find out about any changes that are planned in project's teams. If a customer asks for additional resources, positions in UPSA should be created in a timely manner and after employees pass an interview, they should be assigned to a project immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AM should be aware that PM, Project Coordinator and Project Accounting Assistant receive automatic notifications from UPSA support (Auto UPSA EPAM \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:upsa@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"upsa@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") on a bi-weekly basis. If they receive such notifications that means RP is in a *draft* or *obsolete* status as of today and it should be reviewed, updated (if necessary) and approved by PM (Project Accounting Assistant has got enough permissions to approve RPs as well). It will help to see an actual picture of the workload of employees on the production overall what directly influences on the workload increase and reduction of amount of employees on bench and prediction of future workload across EPAM. The more billable positions are staffed the more effective and profitable the project will be for the account.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you staff an EXISTING PROJECT and you need help with staffing, first of all you should create a PRR. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you consider several locations, or you do not have any specific preferences, please set location as \\\"Undefined\\\" while creating a PRR.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you want Staffing Committee to help you find the most suitable candidate or applicant for a position, you need to create a Project Resource Request with one or more positions that need to be staffed. The Request is sent to Staffing Committee members at a certain location, who analyze it and propose a candidate/applicant. You can then accept or decline their candidate/applicant.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read more about the PRR process \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Creating+a+PRR\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA Cases\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you staff a NEW PROJECT or you are investigating staffing options for an OPPORTUNITY, please create a Case.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(70, 69, 71)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When asked to start and staff a potential project, you need to know when to create a Case vs. a New Project in UPSA. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Case\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a potential project created when negotiations between EPAM and a Customer about starting a new project are in progress. This means that the client has not yet approved the project, either verbally or in writing. A case is created when we are working with a new client and/or the engagement is not scheduled to start immediately (>2 weeks). Follow the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Opening+a+Case\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for Case Creation details.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Booking+Workflow#BookingWorkflow-BookingofCandidatetoCase\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Booking of Candidate to Case\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is Employee Recognition?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an after-the-fact display of appreciation or acknowledgement of an individual's or team's desired behavior, effort or business result that supports the organization's goals and values.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why Does It Matter?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Appreciation is a fundamental human need. Praise and recognition are essential to an outstanding workplace and can boost both engagement and retention. The act of recognizing desired behavior increases the repetition of the desired behavior, and therefore productivity – this is classic behavioral psychology. The reinforced behavior supports the organization's mission and strategic goals.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The recent employee engagement survey proved that Recognition is one of the leading Engagement drivers. The greatest direct correlation between recognition and the engagement index has been observed.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managers can and should have a significant influence over how engaged their team members are and this comes in part from giving staff an appreciation of how their team and job role adds value and contributes to the achievement of organizational aims.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There are multiple elements of employee recognition, and many methods of effectively delivering those elements to individuals and teams.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To help you with this we have produced a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRMKB/Recognition+Toolkit\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition toolkit\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to recognizing, rewarding and engaging your team. You can access a range of helpful recognition tools and techniques for effective communication and engagement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Read more about EPAM \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMOCC/Rewarding\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"rewarding policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://er.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Recognition Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Recognition portal allows everyone to nominate any person from the account and express their gratitude to that person with a potential bonus coming after this. So whether you are a Manager or an engineer you can speak up and mention someone who deserves public recognition and whose good deeds shouldn't be unnoticed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://heroes.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Heroes Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(178, 39, 70)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Heroes Portal helps all employees in EPAM get recognized for their efforts and achievements! With the \\\"wall of recognitions\\\", our team developed the single entry point hub for all positive feedback on our great people. Fell free to spend some time exploring of the best EPAMers. Main part of the portal addresses ability to praise you colleagues or groups, awarding them via intangible, yet remarkable tokens —
